name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Go**, **Cassandra**, **Kafka**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and **Envoy Proxy** for developing scalable distributed systems. Proficient in **AWS** and **GCP**, and skilled in deploying cloud-native applications with robust microservices architecture. Experienced in strongly-typed languages such as JavaScript/TypeScript and Python, with an ability to enhance system performance and reliability.
Adept at team collaboration, fostering a product mindset, and making data-informed decisions to meet business objectives. Proven track record in delivering applications across healthcare and financial sectors, with a strong focus on compliance-driven development following HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Well-versed in MLOps and implementing AI/ML-powered solutions to drive innovation.
